topic.title: How to Hide Descriptions in Related Links Sections

body.p: The link descriptions coming from the DITA relationship tables or from in-topic related links elements are structured in the merged map as:
body.codeblock: <related-links class="- topic/related-links "> <linkpool class="- topic/linkpool "> <link class="- topic/link " ... role="friend" scope="local" type="topic"> <linktext class="- topic/linktext ">Salvia</linktext> <desc class="- topic/desc ">The salvia plant</desc> </link> </linkpool> ... </related-links>
